summary: All three requirements appear to be implemented. REQ-1 is addressed by deriving TOTAL_PAGES from storyPages.length in App.tsx and passing it as a prop to StoryPage. REQ-2 is addressed by keeping only one race reference ('a Black kid from the A' in File #1) and removing others. REQ-3 is addressed by adding GGFan mentions in File #2 and File #3.
